titleStmt.title: An account of the tryals of several notorious malefactors. For murders, felonies, and burglaries Holden at the Sessions-House in the Old-Baily, for the City of London and county of Middlesex. And goal-delivery of Newgate. Which began on Friday the 24. of this instant February, and concluded on Saturday the 25. With the other most remarkable proceedings. Where were many notable proceedings, as the tryal of George Pye, the bailiff, who killed the butcher, and Alexander Younger, who swore treason against Mr. Harvy, with several others.

An account of the tryals of several notorious malefactors. For murders, felonies, and burglaries Holden at the Sessions-House in the Old-Baily, for the City of London and county of Middlesex. And goal-delivery of Newgate. Which began on Friday the 24. of this instant February, and concluded on Saturday the 25. With the other most remarkable proceedings. Where were many notable proceedings, as the tryal of George Pye, the bailiff, who killed the butcher, and Alexander Younger, who swore treason against Mr. Harvy, with several others.
